---
title: OpenAI Connection Checkup Docs
---

Welcome to the console documentation for interacting with OpenAI! This guide will help you understand how to use the command-line interface to interact with OpenAI's chat API using a simple script.

### Usage

To run the console interface, you can use the following command:

```bash
❯ python genailib_wl_folder/test_openai_connection.py
Connection was Successful
Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!

❯ python genailib_wl_folder/test_openai_connection.py
Connection Failed
An error occurred: [Error message]
```
